alert.note: Alert for Northern Fairfield; Northern Middlesex; Northern New Haven; Northern New London (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 27 at 3:39PM EST until February 28 at 3:00PM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM EST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 7 inches. * WHERE...Northern Fairfield, Northern New Haven, Northern Middlesex and Northern New London Counties. * WHEN...Until 3 PM EST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions will impact the Tuesday commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Check local Department of Transportation information services for the latest road conditions.

area.areaDesc: Northern Fairfield; Northern Middlesex; Northern New Haven; Northern New London
